body:
As a user of Spack I want the `environment-modules` package to be updated so that I can install v4.X

### Rationale

Being able to install `environment-modules` v4.X is an essential part of integrating it into Spack!


### Additional information

Checking the documentation of [Environment Modules](https://modules.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) it seems that an initial list of modifications to the package should be:
- [ ] move the url to github
- [ ] add versions from 4.2.2 until 4.0.0
- [ ] check if new configure options (e.g. `--enable-auto-handling`, `--with-quarantine-vars`, `--with-pager`, `--with-pager-opts`, etc.) are to be used in the recipe
title: Update environment-modules to latest versions
